SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Controller

Class ServerController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Controller.ServerController
public class ServerController extends Object
The ServerController class serves as the controller for the server-side model. It handles operations related to server functionalities such as creating and joining lobbies.

  • Method Details

    • signUp

      public String signUp(ClientHandler ch, String username, String password) throws AccountAlreadyExistsException
      Signs up a new user with the specified username and password.
      Parameters:
      ch - The client handler associated with the user.
      username - The username of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the success of the signup process.
      Throws:
      AccountAlreadyExistsException - If an account with the same username already exists.

    • login

      public String login(ClientHandler ch, String username, String password) throws IncorrectPasswordException, AccountAlreadyLoggedInException, AccountNotFoundException
      Logs in a user with the specified username and password.
      Parameters:
      ch - The client handler associated with the user.
      username - The username of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the success of the login process.
      Throws:
      IncorrectPasswordException - If the provided password is incorrect.
      AccountAlreadyLoggedInException - If the account is already logged in.
      AccountNotFoundException - If the account with the specified username does not exist.

    • userDisconnectionProcedure

      public void userDisconnectionProcedure(String username)
      Handles the disconnection of a user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the disconnected user.

    • quitLayer

      public void quitLayer(String username)
      Quits the layer for a user, terminating their session.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to quit.

    • createNewLobby

      public LobbyController createNewLobby(String lobbyName, String username, int targetNumberUsers, ClientHandler ch) throws LobbyNameAlreadyTakenException, InvalidLobbySettingsException
      Creates a new lobby with the given name and assigns the specified user as the owner.
      Parameters:
      lobbyName - The name of the lobby to be created.
      targetNumberUsers - Number of players the admin wants to start a game with.
      Returns:
      The LobbyController object associated with the newly created lobby.
      Throws:
      LobbyNameAlreadyTakenException
      InvalidLobbySettingsException

    • joinLobby

      public LobbyController joinLobby(String lobbyName, String username, ClientHandler connection) throws LobbyNotFoundException, LobbyClosedException, LobbyUserAlreadyConnectedException
      Allows a user to join an existing lobby with the given lobbyName.
      Adds the user to the lobby and returns the controller for that lobby.
      Parameters:
      lobbyName - The lobbyName of the lobby to join.
      Returns:
      The LobbyController object associated with the joined lobby.
      Throws:
      LobbyNotFoundException
      LobbyClosedException
      LobbyUserAlreadyConnectedException

    • addLobbyPreviewObserver

      public void addLobbyPreviewObserver(String username, ClientHandler ch)
      Adds a client handler as an observer for lobby preview updates.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the observer.
      ch - The client handler associated with the observer.

    • removeLobbyPreviewObserver

      public void removeLobbyPreviewObserver(String username)
      Removes a client handler as an observer for lobby preview updates.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the observer to remove.
